fullText: Ben Stiller brings a manic intensity to the role of Artie Shaughnessy, the aspiring songwriter whose dreams of hitting it big are as delusional as they are persistent. Stiller's performance is both physically and emotionally committed, even if it occasionally veers toward the cartoonish.
